verbs.description: In his [V: rambling] [ARG1: press conference] before the G-7 summit , Trump made clear that he really loves his pardoning power and that he is considering pardoning others , including Muhammad Ali , who does n’t need pardoning . He was convicted of dodging the Vietnam draft but the Supreme Court later overturned that conviction and expunged his record . What this …
